subject: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
Your Ref: ...............
TELEX: CBNBANK.
PAYMENT FILE: CBN/BEN/2024
Attention:Beneficiary,
Definitely, I know that this letter will be a surprising one to you. Firstly, I will like to introduce myself formally as  Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso, The Executive Governor of The Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) I am re sending you this very mail once again just because the impostors are still contacting me on your behalf stating that you sent him.
I am officially contacting you once again today because your total Funds were Re-deposited into the "Federal Suspense  Account" of CBN last week, because you did not forward your Claim as the Right
beneficiary. The Central Bank of Nigeria is the mother Bank of all commercial Banks here in Nigeria. Really coming of the strange man were unexpected by me because such visit was impromptu as i was told that he comes to collect the Inheritance Bill Sum of 27 Million United States Dollars ($27,000,000.00), which rightfully belongs to you, on your behalf.
At this development I asked  who authorized you to come down to Nigeria for the Collection of this Payment and was told  that you asked him to come and collect this Funds on your Behalf. In fact this
was the biggest shock that this Bank has ever received so far because your Inheritance Funds are still in the "Federal Suspense Account" of CBN, yet you sent so one  to come and collect these Funds on your behalf without notifying us.
We in this Bank do not understand why you sent such a person to come and Collect your Funds on your behalf. If actually you want anyone  to help you collect your approved  Bill Sum, at least you should have informed me as the Executive Governor of this Bank. Honestly, it really baffles me that you took such a decision without my consent.
As the Governor of this Noble Bank, I was supposed to Release these Funds to him but I refused to do so because I wanted to hear from you first. Due to the Nature of my job, I will not want to make any
mistake in releasing this Fund to anyone except you who is the recognized  Beneficiary to this Fund.
Kindly clarify us on this issue before we make this Payment to the foreigner who came on your behalf in receipt of this confidential Letter, you are required to respond immediately to this email:
(
centralbenkcustom02@gmail.com
) with your full name, address and phone number for reconfirmation and immediate action or you call me with my mobile telephone number below for more clarification.
Best Regards
Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso
Email: 
centralbenkcustom02@gmail.com
Executive Governor Central Bank Nigeria
For Inquiries Call +234-9074300283

subject: Re:   Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about the situation. I must say, it's quite surprising to hear that someone is claiming to represent me without my knowledge or consent.

I'm curious, could you possibly provide more details about this individual? What did they look like? Did they provide any identification or proof of their claim?

Also, I would like to know more about these funds you mentioned. How did they end up in the Federal Suspense Account of CBN? And why are they linked to my name?

I appreciate your diligence in handling this matter and look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
From The Desk Of Mr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso
CEO/Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN)
Tinubu Sqare,P.M.B.12194,Lagos Island,Lagos,Nigeria.
Fund Approved Payment Verification.
Our Ref:CBN/IRD/CBX/021/2014.



Attention:




                                                Transaction In Progress
Updates


Acknowledged your email, Be Informed That All The Document Are Interlocked
With Us In This Bank But Before We Proceed By This
Transaction Of Your Fund We Are Going To Get An Approval From The Presidential
Office So Kindly Get Back With Respond By Sending The Required Information
Bellow :

Your Full Name :
Your Home Address :
Your Next Of Kin
Your Direct Cell Number
Marital Status :
Age And Occupation
Scan Copy Of Your Drivers License

The Information Is Required From You For Quick Processing Of Your Fund Because
We Want To Know We Are Dealing With Right Owner Of This Mail.Thank You For
Reconfirming To Your Name This Is Number One Prove I Just In Our Payment
File And See Really You Are Right About Your Name Thanks Once More
.

Thank You For Your Understanding As I Look Forward To Read From You .

Await Your Urgency In Reply
I Look Forward To Read From You .
Thanks and God Bless,
Mr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso.
Central Bank Governor
For inquiry you can call my lane line +23400979517087

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Hello Mr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite intrigued by your message, although I must admit, it's a bit confusing. Could you please clarify what this is all about? 

You mentioned something about a fund and needing approval from an office. What fund are you referring to and which office needs to give approval? Also, why do you need information about my next of kin and my occupation?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
We receive your email everything is well noted okay the reason why we ask
for your next of King should in case the delivering company want to deliver
the ATM card to you or the bank draft we have to include the next of King
name okay so please you have to send us the details as required so that we
can start the process on how their fund will be released to you without any
further delay thank you and God bless you

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your efforts in ensuring a smooth process. However, I'm a bit confused about the term "next of King". Could you please clarify what exactly it means? 

Also, could you provide more information about this ATM card or bank draft? How does it work and how will it help in releasing the funds?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Listen to me once you receive the ATM card you can go to any ATM machine in
your country and make a withdrawal okay or if you choose a bank draft once
the delivery company deliver the bank drop to you you can take it to your
bank for deposit and it will take three to four working days for the bank
draft to reflect into your account in your country okay that is the reason
why you have to provide this information required where the bank draft or
the ATM card will be delivered to I hope you understand me very well

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for explaining the process to me. It sounds quite convenient! I'm just wondering, how does the ATM card work? Is it like a regular debit card that I can use at any ATM machine? And for the bank draft, is it similar to a check that I can deposit into my account?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
We receive your email everything is well noted I just want to let you know
that the ATM card we are talking about is a debit card which you are going
to use in any ATM machine in your country okay number two the bank draft is
a check that you are going to deposit in your local bank in your country
which is going to take 3 to 4 working days after you deposit it before they
will credit your local bank account to have to choose one out of these two
options either by ATM card or by the bank draft okay I will be waiting for
your response as soon as possible

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me. 

I'm curious about how this ATM card works. Is it similar to a regular debit card that I can use at any ATM machine? And regarding the bank draft, is it like a normal check that I can deposit into my account?

Also, could you please provide more information on how these two options differ from each other? Which one would be more convenient and secure for me?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience in explaining the process to me. 

I'm a bit confused though, could you please clarify a few things for me? When you say ATM card, do you mean it's like a regular debit card that I can use at any ATM machine? And regarding the bank draft, is it similar to a normal check that I can deposit into my bank account?

Also, could you please explain how these two options work? Like, how would I receive the ATM card or bank draft? Would they be delivered to my home address or do I need to pick them up from somewhere?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience in explaining these options to me. 

So, if I understand correctly, I can choose between an ATM card that I can use at any local ATM machine or a bank draft that I can deposit into my local bank account. Is that correct? 

Could you please provide more information on how each of these options work? For instance, are there any fees associated with using the ATM card or depositing the bank draft? Also, how long would it take for me to receive either the ATM card or the bank draft once I've made my choice?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Thomas

subject: Re: Our Ref: CBN/OHG/OXD1/2024
body:

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed explanation. I appreciate your patience in explaining these options to me. 

So, if I understand correctly, I can either choose to receive an ATM card that I can use at any ATM machine in my country or a bank draft that I can deposit into my local bank account. Is that correct?

Could you please provide more information about these two options? For instance, are there any fees associated with using the ATM card or depositing the bank draft? Also, how long would it take for me to receive either of these?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Thomas
